_header: God save King Harry wherever he go or ride
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 485; probably for Henry VIII.
Subjects: George, saint; prayers, special occasions; Henry VIII, prayers for
_description: ‘Sent george be hys forman hovre blyssyd lady be hys gyde’ — one long couplet

CamTCC1157.Transcription:
God safe kyng hare whare hefer he go or rydesent gorge be hys forman
                    hovre blyssyd lady be hys gyde
CamTCC1157.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             Catalogue of the
                    Western Manuscripts in the Library of Trinity College, Cambridge.
         4 vols. Cambridge: at the UP, 1900-1904: 170.
